title: Sony is making it easier to share PS5 screenshots using its iOS app
content:
Gamers will now have an easier time sharing PS5 screenshots with their iOS devices. Sony is offering users the capability to upload PS5 screenshots and videos automatically to the PlayStation mobile app.
